amendment.description: To establish a competitive research program within the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4924 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4924 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To establish a competitive research program within the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4924 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4924 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Rockefeller.
